entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning overnight. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
